page.title: 11Hewelsfield Court.
page.content: Mr. Simmons told us that on his farm land he has{1000 sheep and 100 cattle. In Mr. Simmon's field there is an {interesting rectangular}shape.It is a kind of {pond to wash }the horse's and sheep's feet.It started as a ditch, then the river overflowed into it.In the fields there is barley and corn. Mr. Simmons also does{Bed and {Breakfast.}Mr. Simmons told us that there are on average {two people}a week that use{Bed and Breakfast}.He has { 4 rooms }for Bed and Breakfast} and 16 rooms altogether. He does not use {the produce of the farm}to cook for his guests ,he sells it instead. The guests may go there because it is very peaceful and in the countryside.
